AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: bug catcher
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] caught insects along with many others from [PAWN_possessive] tribe, an important task in the community.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Chief's Tadpole
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the child of [PAWN_possessive] tribe's chief.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Transformed Druid
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was once a druid who reached a great age before deciding to transform into a frogman and start over with his life. [PAWN_pronoun] retained much of [PAWN_possessive] wisdom.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Lost Tadpole
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] swam away from the tadpole pond while no one was looking, and was forced to grow up alone among the frogs of the swamp.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Warrior Trainee
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood training to become one of [PAWN_possessive] tribe's elite warriors.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Frog Alchemist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] practiced the art of frog alchemy, transmuting ingredients into insect meat to aid his people.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Frog Keeper
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] tended to the tribe's army of tamed frogs.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Frog Chieftain
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a notable leader of [PAWN_possessive] tribe.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Frog Poacher
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] abandoned [PAWN_possessive] tribe and survived by killing and eating the non-sapient frogs of the swamp, a horrible crime in Frogman society. [PAWN_pronoun] eventually developed a taste for much smarter frogs...

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Tadpole Tender
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] watched the young tadpoles, keeping them safe from predators and the environment until they were able to survive on their own.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Frog Warrior
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] protected the tribe as an elite warrior.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Fly Chef
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] cooked insect meat into delicious meals such as fly quiche, fly cake, and fly soup.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Puppeteer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up, [PAWN_nameDef] was passionate about making and playing with puppets. [PAWN_pronoun] would frequently operate puppets to entertain [PAWN_possessive] fellow children.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Frog Supremecist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] believes that frogmen are the greatest race in the universe, and superior to all others.
